introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is "おそわる," which you will often hear in educational settings, guidance sessions, or when discussing learning experiences.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "おそわる" means "to be taught or to learn from someone." It often indicates the act of receiving instruction or guidance from a teacher or mentor. This word implies a sense of being a learner in a situation where knowledge or skills are being transferred from one person to another.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 教える : おしえる : to teach
習う : ならう : to take lessons in
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "おそわる" are "おしえる" and "ならう." While "おしえる" means "to teach" and usually involves actively imparting knowledge, "ならう" means "to learn a skill" through practice or by being taught by someone else. "ならう" is more focused on the acquisition of skills and is closer to "おそわる" in context, but it emphasizes the aspect of training or practicing.
antonyms: 忘れる : わすれる : to forget
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "おそわる" is "わすれる," which means "to forget." While "おそわる" is about acquiring knowledge or skills, "わすれる" involves losing or failing to remember that acquired information or ability.

collocations.kanji: りょうしんにおそわる
collocations.furigana: りょうしんにおそわる

collocations.kanji: じゅぎょうでおそわる
collocations.furigana: じゅぎょうでおそわる

collocations.kanji: ともだちからおそわる
collocations.furigana: ともだちからおそわる

collocations.kanji: けいけんからおそわる
collocations.furigana: けいけんからおそわる

example_sentences.kanji: 私は先生に日本語を教わります。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は先生(せんせい)に日本語(にほんご)を教(おそわ)ります。

translations.EN: I am taught Japanese by the teacher.
translations.ID: Saya diajari bahasa Jepang oleh guru.
translations.VI: Tôi được giáo viên dạy học tiếng Nhật.
translations.FR: J'apprends le japonais avec le professeur.
translations.BN: আমি শিক্ষকের কাছ থেকে জাপানি শেখি।
translations.TL: Ako ay tinuturuan ng Hapon ng guro.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် ဆရာများမှ ဂျပန်ဘာသာစကားကို သင်ကြားခံရသည်။
translations.HI: मैं शिक्षक से जापानी भाषा सीखता हूँ।
translations.AR: أنا أتعلم اللغة اليابانية من المعلم.
translations.FA: من توسط معلم، زبان ژاپنی یاد می‌گیرم.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は両親に教わりました。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は両親(りょうしん)に教(おそ)わりました。

translations.ID: Saya belajar dari orang tua saya.
translations.VI: Tôi đã học từ cha mẹ tôi.
translations.BN: আমি আমার বাবা-মার কাছ থেকে শিখেছি।
translations.TL: Natuto ako mula sa aking mga magulang.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည်မိဘများထံမှသင်ယူခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 私はじゅぎょうで数学を教わります。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)はじゅぎょうで数(すう)学(がく)を教(おそ)わります。

translations.TL: Natuto ako ng matematika sa klase.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် အတန်းတွင် သင်္ချာသင်ယူသည်။
translations.HI: मैं कक्षा में गणित पढ़ता हूँ।
translations.FA: من در کلاس ریاضیات یاد می‌گیرم.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は友達から数学を教わりました。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は友達(ともだち)から数学(すうがく)を教(おそ)わりました。

translations.EN: I learned math from a friend.
translations.VI: Tôi đã học toán từ một người bạn.
translations.FR: J'ai appris les mathématiques par un ami.
translations.BN: আমি বন্ধুর কাছ থেকে গণিত শিখেছি।
translations.ZH: 我从朋友那里学会了数学。
translations.TL: Natuto akong mag-matematika mula sa kaibigan.
translations.MY: ငါသူငယ်ချင်းတစ်ယောက်ဆီကသင်္ချာလေ့လာခဲ့တယ်။
translations.HI: मैंने एक दोस्त से गणित सीखा।
translations.FA: من ریاضی را از یک دوست یاد گرفتم.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は経験から教わります。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は経験(けいけん)から教(おそ)わります。

translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် အတွေ့အကြုံမှ သင်ယူပါသည်။

meanings_translations.MY: သင်ယူခြင်း

parts_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
